channel.title: How to get Rid of Runescape webclient ads completly
channel.description: OK well I have figured our how to remove the ads in runescape webclient you have to go and block these website cookies from your internet explorer internet options http://www.runescape.com/advert/advert.ws I figured this out when I went to the library and it automaticly blocked it so if you hate ads this will be the right answer for you hope this helped.
